snippet: Louisville teams doctors decided it was best for Kevin Ware to rest rather than attend a news conference Friday. Ware planned to attend Saturday’s national semifinal against Wichita State and will sit on the team bench.
abstract: Louisville teams doctors decided it was best for Kevin Ware to rest rather than attend a news conference Friday. Ware planned to attend Saturday’s national semifinal against Wichita State and will sit on the team bench.

headline.main: Ware Takes a Break, But Will Attend Louisville's Game
